resources.string: Earn rewards as you drink at your local bar.Spend a minimum of $10.00 to earn a cube.5 Cunes accumulated earn you a reward.
Don\'t wait on crowded bars or use your credit cards anymore to make payments.Stir up lets you pay by phone for your drinks and automatically recieve rewards.
Your tab is automatically open at the bar when you walk in. Gibe the bar tender the "Stir out" when you are ready to pay your bill.
Looking out for a Happy hours drinks? Stir up keeps you upto date with events at each bar.
